articles.title: White House says U.S. will not lock down to fight Covid as European nations implement restrictions - CNBC
articles.description: "We can curb the spread of the virus without having to in any way shut down our economy,"  White House coronavirus response coordinator Jeff Zients said.
articles.content:
The Biden administration has no plans to curb future Covid-19 surges using a nationwide lockdown, White House coronavirus response coordinator Jeff Zients said at a briefing Monday.

articles.title: Austria brings back COVID lockdown amid angry protests across Europe - CBS News
articles.description: New restrictions to control the coronavirus, including a looming vaccine mandate in Austria, have sparked large protests across the continent, including some that have turned violent.

articles.title: Dollar shines, euro suffers as COVID-19 fears flare over Europe - CNA
articles.description:
TOKYO: The safe-haven US dollar traded close to a 16-month high to the euro on Monday (Nov 22) on growing anxiety over the impact of surging COVID-19 infections in Europe, with Austria reimposing a full lockdown and Germany considering following suit.
